퍼즐류를 좋아하고 머리 쓰는 게임을 좋아한다면 정말 재밌다

A timeless classic, Portal 2 expands on the relatively short original into a fully-fledged video game with a story,
wonderful animations, graphics that hold up, and bumping music when it counts. It also makes my head hurt from concentration!

It's a game I know I've played more than once, seen more than once, and thought about very often, and it's an inspiration to many who wish to make action-packed first-person puzzle games.

You can't miss out on this game.
Make sure you finish the game 5464525 times.
я не знаю что сказать о игре ну игра та крутая  очень

This games is great if your into puzzle solving, it has a great story line along with a great amount of detail. I'd also recommend that you play the first game for better understanding of this game. It's completely worth the price tag and if you have a friend that also has this game you can play co-op which has more complex puzzles and another additional story mode to go with it. There are also i lot of ester eggs that bring more lour to this game and can add more story. Thanks for reading my review, if there's anything you would like to say about it then leave a comment. Thank you
Great storytelling, fantastic cast of characters, no gripes with this game.
This game is like siege, its fun as all hell, I felt great are completing my task and in this game it's solving puzzles, it also made me very angry, and as well as even more angry. 10/10
я проходил игру (на другой платформе) и она прекрасна! Хороший сюжет, шутки, посхалки и атмосфера делают игру хорошей головоломкой.
я ебал что мне похуй вапче

Way funnier than the first one. When is portal 3? 
Also the puzzles felt easier this time round.
This is the best game ever! I has interwoven story line and logical puzzle solving in a way that is unprecedented.
Türünün tek örneği. Muhteşem bir oyun, bu oyunu oynamayan kendine oyuncuyum falan demesin o kadar diyorum.
story is awsome, rooms are huge, makes a lot of fun

Really good! I had a lot of fun playing the campaign, and a lot of fun playing with friends! Great game!
Absolutely timeless game. They don't make stuff like this anymore. Story-line is epic, game-play is awesome and puzzles make you feel like both a genius and a pleb simultaneously
is fun puzzles and very funny and co op is very good
Прошли вместе с другом обе части , не пожалели потраченного времени . Есть миссии которые не могли пройти час-полтора , но в целом давольно быстро проходится . Было прикольно и весело.  Рекомендую!

I think it's a great sequel to the first portal giving you a great leave off from the end of the first game. Seeing it's also in the same universe as half life it's an excellent distraction while waiting for half life 3 (that is if you've either beaten half life alyx or can't play it cause you don't have a VR headset). Either way it's a good game and you should try it, also there's a multiplayer feature so there's a second story you can do with your friends!!
main campaign is fucking awesome easily one of my top 10 games and when you're done with that there's a shit ton of custom levels and workshop mods and everything is amazing
Всем рекомендуй найти себе хорошего напарника, и пройти кооператив этой замечательной игры.

Отличное продолжение первого Портала, помимо хорошо прописанной сюжетной линии головоломки здесь стали еще изощреннее, или мне так показалось, ибо 1 часть я прошел за один присест.
Совместный режим отличная идея, но у меня увы, нет друзей. :D
Концовочка понравилась, эпично.
Portal 3 никогда.(((
Arkadaşlarınız ile keyifli anlar yaşayabileceğiniz,tek başınıza iken çıldıracağınız bir oyun.
Fabuła perfekcyjna a tryb co op idealny do grania z znajomymi.
Fabuła zarąbista, pełno smaczków, dialogi to mistrzostwo, i humor wybitny. Polecam bardzo

es macht Spaß. Und man kann dort viele coole Abenteuer erleben und wenn man es mit seinen Freunden spielt verknüpft es einen mehr . Und man lernt was Team work ist. Ebenfalls muss man sich bei Manchen Rätseln vertrauen können
Ну так, часов за 10 можно пройти всю игру + онлайн. На пару вечерков сгодится. Игра шедевр, Valve молодцы.
I kind of share the opinion of a few folks, regarding the awesomeness of the game and the endless fun it provides.
Gra świetna, dobra fabuła, wiele poziomów.

Impresionante clásico que luego de jugarlo por primera vez en pleno 2020 puedo decir que es un [b]joya[/b] que se tiene que jugar si o si, se mantiene [b]fresco[/b] gracias a su [b]característico gameplay[/b] y motor grafico [i]Source,[/i] [b]puzzles muy entretenidos[/b] y desafiantes, con un antagonista que ya es parte de la cultural popular de los videojuegos. Se lo puede encontrar por [b]precios absurdamente bajos[/b] en las ofertas de temporadas de Steam así que [b]no hay excusa para no tenerlo en la biblioteca[/b]. Recomiendo enormemente tratar de jugarlo de manera cooperativa ya que aumenta considerablemente el nivel de la experiencia. 


Lo único malo que le vi fue que tuve dificultades para desactivar el chat de voz al jugarlo en su modo cooperativo online. Para ello tuve que buscar alguna guía y finalmente la solución era introduciendo un comando en la consola de desarrolladores que tiene el mismo juego.
